document.full_text: matthew cucchiaro said that the blog, titled 'today's stupid human beings: women,' was 'clearly satirical' and that he wrote it before he got his job as diversity director for the student government.
document.title: university aide resigns over blog item
lines_and_colors: matthew cucchiaro said that the blog, titled 'today's stupid human beings: women,' was 'clearly satirical' and that he wrote it before he got his job as diversity director for the student government.
